title: Don't 'Follow Your Bliss.' Instead, Find Love in Your Work.
description: Love, the most powerful of human emotions, has been systematically drained from our lives - our work, teams, and classrooms. Marcus Buckingham says it's time we brought love back in.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Love, the most powerful of human emotions, has been systematically drained from our lives - our work, teams, and classrooms. Marcus Buckingham says it's time we brought love back in.
content:encoded: Love, the most powerful of human emotions, has been systematically drained from our lives - our work, teams, and classrooms. Marcus Buckingham says it's time we brought love back in.
